All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApplyCorrectionsAction
Handles the "Apply Corrections" button click on the results form.
BatchSelectDialog
Provides a form for users to select a group of cavities at once via zones and areas.
CavityCache
A global thread-safe repository of cavities.
CavityChooser
A "chooser" widget for choosing a cavity.
CavityChooserDialog
The graphical dialog interface for the cavity chooser.
CavityDocument
A text document model for holding a cavity name.
CavityNameTableModel
A table model for holding cavities by name only.
CavityWithLastCorrection
An immutable record for a cavity with last phase correction date.
CavityWithLastCorrectionComparator
A comparator for programmatically sorting in the same way a JTable RowSorter applied to a table with a CavityWithLastCorrectionTableModel performs.
CavityWithLastCorrectionTableModel
A table model for holding cavities by name and last correction date, and which relies on the view (JTable) to handle dynamic sorting.
Chooser<E>
A "chooser" widget template for choosing a generic element of type E.
ChooserDialog<E>
A template for chooser dialogs.
ClearableMaskFormatter
A MaskFormatter that allows users to clear it.
CommandException
An exception that arises executing a command.
ConfirmOverwriteFileChooser
A file chooser which prompts the user before allowing file overwrite.
DatabaseConsole
A contract for classes to query the Phaser Database.
ElogResultsService
Exports Phaser results to the Jefferson Lab electronic logbook.
ExcelResultsService
Exports Phaser results to Microsoft Excel format.
ExitListener
A contract for classes interested in user request to exit.
ExportElogAction
Handles the "eLog" button click on the results form.
ExportExcelAction
Handles the "Excel" button click on the results form.
FrostedGlassPane
When visible covers the entire frame/dialog with a 50% transparent shroud preventing users from interacting.
GenericButtonAreaLayout
This class is a configurable LayoutManager for a panel of buttons.
HelpDialog
Provides version and contact information as well as links to documentation.
HyperLinkEnabledMessage
A widget for displaying a hyperlink and opening the user's default web browser with the referenced page when the link is clicked.
InitializationException
An exception that arises during program initialization.
InitializeNewJobDialogWorker
Prepares the New Job dialog by performing the initial database query to obtain the last phase correction date of cavities.
InitializeResultsDialogWorker
Prepares the Results dialog by performing the initial database queries and populating the form with initial values.
JobFilter
An immutable job query filter.
JobFilterChooser
A "chooser" widget for choosing a JobFilter.
JobFilterChooserDialog
The graphical dialog interface for the JobFilter chooser.
JobIdDocument
A text document model for holding a job ID.
JobPage
An immutable page of jobs as returned from a jobs query.
JobRecord
An immutable job record.
JobsAction
Handles the "Get Jobs" button click on the jobs form.
JobSpecification
An immutable job specification as required by the Phaser server.
JobsWorker
Searches for jobs in the Phaser database utilizing a filter and paginator.
JobTableModel
A table model for holding jobs.
JsonDecoder
Responsible for decoding JSON messages from a Netty Channel.
LedLight
An LED light widget.
MaydayFrame
The Mayday frame, which provides a final message before the application closes unexpectedly.
MinimumExecutionSwingWorker<T,V>
This is a SwingWorker which guarantees that it will take at least a minimum amount of time to do its job.
NettyJsonConsole
An implementation of a PhaserServerConsole which leverages the Netty network library to do the heavy lifting.
NewJobDialog
Provides a form for job specification and submission.
NextJobsAction
Handles the "Next" button click on the jobs form.
NextResultsAction
Handles the "Next" button click on the results form.
NotificationListener
A contract for classes interested in server notifications.
OptionTableModel
A table model for holding options (boolean fields).
OptionTableModel.OptionRow
A boolean option.
OracleJdbcConsole
Provides access to the Phaser database.
OrderedCavityNameTableModel
A table model for holding cavities by name, which are ordered based on insertion.
OrderedCavityWithLastCorrectionTableModel
A table model for holding cavities by name and last correction date, which are ordered based on insertion.
Paginator
An immutable paginator.
PauseAction
Handles the "Pause" button click on the control form.
PhaseErrorDocument
A text document model for holding phase angle error.
PhaserClientFrame
The main Phaser client GUI window, which allows users to control the phasing process and provides process status.
PhaserClientMessageDecoder
Responsible for decoding JSON messages per the Phaser Client-Server protocol.
PhaserException
The root of the Phaser exception hierarchy.
PhaserJobState
The states of the Phaser process.
PhaserOutcome
The outcomes of the Phaser process.
PhaserServerConsole
A contract for classes to issue commands to the phaser server.
PhaserSwingClient
The entry point of the application.
PopupMenuTableHeaderRenderer
A custom JTable colum header renderer to show a menu button with a pop-up dialog for showing such things as "Select All" and "Select None" menu items.
PreviousJobsAction
Handles the "Previous" button click on the jobs form.
PreviousResultsAction
Handles the "Previous" button click on the results form.
ProgressCavityTableModel
A table model for holding cavities that can also show which cavity is currently selected in the header.
ResponseListener
A contract for classes interested in Phaser Client-Server protocol command responses.
ResultFilter
An immutable result query filter.
ResultFilterChooser
A "chooser" widget for choosing a ResultFilter.
ResultFilterChooserDialog
The graphical dialog interface for the ResultFilter chooser.
ResultPage
An immutable page of results as returned from a results query.
ResultRecord
An immutable result record.
ResultsAction
Handles the "Get Results" button click on the results form.
ResultsDialog
Provides a form for users to search the results database and display results.
ResultsWorker
Searches for results in the Phaser database utilizing a filter and paginator.
ResultTableModel
A table model for holding Phaser results.
ResumeAction
Handles the "Resume" button click on the control form.
ShutdownException
An exception that arises during program shutdown.
SkipAction
Handles the "Skip" button click on the control form.
SortedCavityNameTableModel
A table model for holding cavities by name, which are sorted alphabetically.
StartAction
Handles the "Start" button click on the new job form.
StopAction
Handles the "Stop" button click on the control form.
TimestampChooser
A "chooser" widget for choosing a timestamp.
TimestampChooserDialog
The graphical dialog interface for the timestamp chooser.
ValidationException
An exception that arises during validation.
WaitDialog
Provides a visual indicator that a background process is working.
YearDocument
A text document model for holding a number representation of year.
